channel.title: blarg on Barefoot Rob

item.title: reason 8,144 to hate Apple
item.description:
10:52 Tuesday 01 December 2015 JST I started this copy last night. This morning:
Just now I noted it couldn’t copy even the first folder. There are about 50 folders. Perhaps it could have let me know sooner?
